summary: General/Doctor James Harold "Jimmy" Doolittle, USAF  was an American aviation pioneer.
full_text: James Harold "Jimmy" Doolittle  was an American aviation pioneer. Doolittle served as a commissioned officer in the United States Army Air Forces during the Second World War and was awarded the Medal of Honor for his valor and leadership as commander of the Doolittle Raid while a Lieutenant Colonel.
title: Jimmy Doolittle
